body:
So post the weirdest strategies you have ever seen used in nebula. Here is mine:
 IDK what they where doing: XD:

title: Weirdest stratgies you have ever seen.

replies.body: Covering the monument xD
replies.body_tagged: Covering the monument xD

replies.body: I haz op start on unix ^-^ I used the punch II bow to propel myself through the air about 20 blocks, so 5 shots and i was at the monument mining in like 30 secs. ^-^
replies.body_tagged: I haz op start on unix ^-^ I used the punch II bow to propel myself through the air about 20 blocks, so 5 shots and i was at the monument mining in like 30 secs. ^-^

replies.body: My weirdest strategy was taking off my armor and simply walking to their monument. No one noticed. #ninja
replies.body_tagged: My weirdest strategy was taking off my armor and simply walking to their monument. No one noticed. #ninja

replies.body: That is not the weirdest strategy. I do that all the time inb4 mods say to me I can't do it even though Sr mods said it was ok -_-

replies.body:
I didn't do this, but I watched someone on my team (on Quintus) walk through a bridge backwards to get to the enemy side, walked through the spawn backwards, and get to back middle to win it.

He fooled purple by walking backwards?!?!?!
replies.body_tagged:
I didn't do this, but I watched someone on my team (on Quintus) walk through a bridge backwards to get to the enemy side, walked through the spawn backwards, and get to back middle to win it.

replies.body: Trapping two or more diamond guys in a 1x1x2 hole, placing water in there, and covering it. Best way to kill multiple diamond guys at once, and it's even better when people combat log while being trapped.

replies.body:
This happened 9 month ago on Luar if you remember it. Both teams made a epic railroad cart sequence and made a truth. When I took advantage of this, guess what: My team got MAD at ME for breaking the last monument. My own team even tried to kill me...
The round lated like 1hr, and the railroad was awesome! I think someone was recording, but tbh i dunno who. I don't know what they were goin for. Probably just having fun. They tried to make another railroad next game, buy 1/2 the people lost hope in making a railroad.

replies.body:
The weirdest strategy I used was on one of the maps "Senex", I can't remember the name tho.

I killed an orange player, wore his orange dyed leather helmet, and walked to their monument without being spotted, and mined the monument :3

It's funny how they didn't notice my purple nametag xD

replies.body: Not really a weird strategy, but I saw LeafeonMessiah pull of a strange, clever one with a staircase. Essentially, if the opposing team makes a wooden box around the monument, you can break one of the pieces, then replace it with a staircase, so it's not very noticeable. Then, you can just reach though the hole in it and get the monument. Pretty cool :3
replies.body_tagged: Not really a weird strategy, but I saw LeafeonMessiah pull of a strange, clever one with a staircase. Essentially, if the opposing team makes a wooden box around the monument, you can break one of the pieces, then replace it with a staircase, so it's not very noticeable. Then, you can just reach though the hole in it and get the monument. Pretty cool :3
